Package odu.edu.cs.cs350.pne

Class VocabCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • odu.edu.cs.cs350.pne.VocabCollection
  • public class VocabCollection
extends java.lang.Object
    A VocabCollection holds words that are significant to those documents used for training. This also contains each word's associated document frequency and inverse document frequency.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      VocabCollection()
      Creates a VocabCollection and initially sets the total number of documents to 0.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addWord​(java.lang.String word)
      Adds a word to this VocabCollection and increments the document frequency for that word.
      void calcInverseDocFrequency()
      Calculates the inverse document frequency for every word in this VocabCollection using the equation, log_2(N/df) where N is the total number of documents and df is the document frequency of the respective word.
      int getDocFreq​(java.lang.String word)
      Returns the document frequency of a specific word
      double getInvDocFreq​(java.lang.String word)
      Returns the inverse document frequency of a specific word
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getKeySet()
      Returns all the words in the VocabCollection.
      int getTotalDocuments()
      Returns the total number of documents associated with this VocabCollection.
      java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​WordFrequency> getVocabMap()
      Returns the LinkedHashMap used to store the words.
      void increaseTotalDocs()
      Increases the total number of documents that have contributed to this VocabCollection.
      void readInVocab​(java.lang.String vocabPath)
      Reads a VocabCollection from a file that contains the total number of documents and each word in the VocabCollection alongside its respective document frequency.
      void writeOutVocab​(java.lang.String filePath)
      Writes this VocabCollection to a file, storing the total number of documents and each word in this VocabCollection alongside its respective document frequency.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • VocabCollection

        public VocabCollection()
        Creates a VocabCollection and initially sets the total number of documents to 0.

    • Method Detail

      • increaseTotalDocs

        public void increaseTotalDocs()
        Increases the total number of documents that have contributed to this VocabCollection.

      • addWord

        public void addWord​(java.lang.String word)
        Adds a word to this VocabCollection and increments the document frequency for that word.
        Parameters:
        word - A word to be added to this VocabCollection

      • calcInverseDocFrequency

        public void calcInverseDocFrequency()
        Calculates the inverse document frequency for every word in this VocabCollection using the equation, log_2(N/df) where N is the total number of documents and df is the document frequency of the respective word.

      • readInVocab

        public void readInVocab​(java.lang.String vocabPath)
        Reads a VocabCollection from a file that contains the total number of documents and each word in the VocabCollection alongside its respective document frequency.
        Parameters:
        vocabPath - Path to a stored VocabCollection

      • writeOutVocab

        public void writeOutVocab​(java.lang.String filePath)
        Writes this VocabCollection to a file, storing the total number of documents and each word in this VocabCollection alongside its respective document frequency.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path to a file where the VocabCollection will be stored

      • getKeySet

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getKeySet()
        Returns all the words in the VocabCollection.
        Returns:
        Set of all words in this VocabCollection

      • getVocabMap

        public java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​WordFrequency> getVocabMap()
        Returns the LinkedHashMap used to store the words.
        Returns:
        LinkedHashMap containing all words along with their metadata

      • getTotalDocuments

        public int getTotalDocuments()
        Returns the total number of documents associated with this VocabCollection.
        Returns:
        The total number of documents

      • getInvDocFreq

        public double getInvDocFreq​(java.lang.String word)
        Returns the inverse document frequency of a specific word
        Parameters:
        word - a word in the VocabCollection
        Returns:
        inverse document frequency of the word

      • getDocFreq

        public int getDocFreq​(java.lang.String word)
        Returns the document frequency of a specific word
        Parameters:
        word - a word in the VocabCollection
        Returns:
        document frequency of the word
